title: Live Status
description: Live Status is a meeting room reservation application. It is designed to be deployed on tablets placed outside the rooms.

title: SI Commande Legendre
description: SI Commande is an application from the Legendre group, which allows site managers and foremen to create material orders.
The application also allows for the creation of reusable standard orders.

title: Mayiko's Online Shop
description: Mayiko is an online shop specialized in interior decoration and African craftsmanship.
The site offers a product catalog, an history of past orders, a wishlist, and a search functionality.

title: D.I.C. showcase website
description: To celebrate its 40th anniversary, the Civil Engineering design office DIC SA Ingénieurs has decided to get a new website.
We started with a modern & technological approach, respecting the values ​​of the company, namely: reliability, that stands the test of time and sobriety in production.

title: DGA Management Software
description: During my three years at Sopra Steria, I worked on numerous projects on behalf of the French Ministry of the Armed Forces.
Given the sensitivity of the content, I am not able to reveal images of my work.

title: Tic Tac Tile
description: Tic Tac Tile is an haptic component developed by Ruwido, a remote controls manufacturer.
It is a debossed tactile, broken down into several areas, designed for several purposes: TV, VR, automotive, smart houses.

title: Circle UI
description: Circle is a television interface developed by Ruwido, a remote controls manufacturers.
It is a concept inspired by users and designed to address the problem of navigation history visualisation.
Navigation appends with a circular controller, and the history appears in the center of the screen in the form of layers.

title: Circle Voice
description: Circle voice is a vocal assistant for television, developed by Ruwido, a remote controls manufacturer.
It's a conversational agent, allowing a fast search of content, with combinatorial filters.

title: Rossignol Brand Identity
description: A brand identity for a second-hand shop named Rossignol de mes amours.
The logo's iconographic part features a nightingale stylized into a heart shape, with its head held high as if proud of its latest outfit.
The typographic aspect utilizes a font inspired by the 1970s, offering a vintage feel while retaining the playful nature of the previous logo.

title: Byblos Game
description: Byblos is a mobile game. The aim of the game is to place spheres with symbols on corresponding tiles.
Spheres move altogether sliding in four directions (up, down, left, right). As the player progresses, other elements add up.

title: Phenomena Font
description: Phenomena is an Art déco font, based on 20s, 30s advertisment.
